total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern in the input grid that is repeated in the output grid.
Q2: Identify the changes made to the input grid to transform it into the output grid.
Q3: Identify the pattern of the changes made in the transformation.
Q4: Apply the identified pattern of changes to the input grid of the quiz.
Q5: Verify if the changes applied to the input grid of the quiz match the pattern of changes identified in the examples.
Q1: Identify the pattern in the input grid that is repeated in the output grid.
Q2: Identify the changes made in the output grid compared to the input grid.
Q3: Determine the rule for the transformation from the input grid to the output grid based on the identified pattern and changes.
Q4: Apply the transformation rule to the input grid of the quiz to generate the output grid.
